text.name: system_description
text.text: The Neo-Geo CD (ネオジオCD) is based on the architecture of the Neo-Geo AES and Neo-Geo MVS, but uses CD-ROMs instead of cartridges, in order to reduce the price of the games. The vast majority of games have been converted to CD versions. However, there are a few games exclusive to the Neo-Geo CD such as Ironclad or ZinTrick.
